pr_title: ISPN-12594 Exception in cache streams with DENY_READ_WRITES

timeline.message:
ISPN-12594 Exception in cache streams with DENY_READ_WRITES

Use UnicastProcessor instead of PublishProcessor,
as PublishProcessor calls request() too early.
